p: The concentration of H 2O 2 at 10 μM significantly reduced cell viability (80.6% ± 3.7%) ( P < 0.001) which previously report for aging model by Nopparat et al.,[ 15] [ Figure 3a]. The results revealed that the MH and hispidulin at 50 μg/mL showed the cytotoxicity effect (95.0% ± 2.9% and 94.4% ± 2.8%) ( P < 0.01) [ Figure 3b and c]. According to the subsequent experiment, we used the concentration of MH at 0.1, 1, and 10μg/mL, and hispidulin at 10 μg/mL (positive control).
